Description:
Working with a team of developers and communicating with them to form a product roadmap to achieve goals.
Ensuring compatibility across multiple platforms and boosting issue fixation during the testing and production phase.
Ensure the development of essential databases for maintaining a smooth flow of in-house tasks and computing operations.
Adhering to strict deadlines laid by the management for project completion and delivery.
Find common errors in existing software to prevent possible issues that can disrupt the smooth flow of operations.
Deploy robust security protocols to protect the company's sensitive information.Skills
Skills:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Software Engineering, or similar major.
Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores.
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, Node.js)
Fluent communicator with a remarkable potential to interact and work with required professionals.
Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (e.g. HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, jQuery).
